login.title: Log in
login.social: Use one of these social accounts

email.signup: Don't have an account yet? Sign up

password.title: Password
password.requirements_hint: Min 8 characters, 1+ uppercase and 1+ special character

requirements.minLength: Password must contain at last {{ number }} characters

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again

new.title: New Timesheet
new.error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
new.hours_worked_description: We will keep track of how much you work on a weekly basis and tell you how much overtime you've worked that week, or if you need to make up some hours.

mode.label: How you want to track your hours

target.title: Weekly hours
target.description: You work predictable hours every week and want to keep track of overtime.

no_target.title: Timer
no_target.description: Track how long you've worked on something.

minutes.label: minutes*
minutes.error_max: No more than 59 minutes in an hour

daysPerWeek.label: How many days do you work in a week?*
daysPerWeek.description: If your days vary, put down your average
daysPerWeek.error_min: If you don't work regular hours, a simple timesheet might work better for you
daysPerWeek.error_max: No more than 7 days in a week

breaks.label: Let's talk breaks
breaks.description: Enter how long you tend to take a break for. This will be used to predict when you'll finish for the day.

unpaid.label: Unpaid (mins)
unpaid.description: Will not count as hours worked.

edit.error_generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
edit.hours_worked_description: We will keep track of how much you work on a weekly basis and tell you how much overtime you've worked that week, or if you need to make up some hours.

target.title: Office hours
target.description: Predictable hours and keeping track of overtime. Most suitable for jobs with weekly hour targets.

no_target.title: Timer
no_target.description: Track how long you've worked on something.

minutes.label: minutes*
minutes.error_max: No more than 59 minutes in an hour

daysPerWeek.label: How many days do you work in a week?*
daysPerWeek.description: If your days vary, put down your average
daysPerWeek.error_min: If you don't work regular hours, a simple timesheet might work better for you
daysPerWeek.error_max: No more than 7 days in a week

breaks.label: Breaks
breaks.description: This will be used to predict when you've reached your hours for the day.

unpaid.label: Unpaid (mins)
unpaid.description: Will not count as hours worked.

break_in.disabled_no_clock_in: You have not clocked in yet

break_out.disabled_no_clock_in: You have not clocked in yet

clock_out.disabled_no_clock_in: You have not clocked in yet

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again later

break_in.label: Break In
break_in.error_before_clock_in: Cannot start break before day started
break_in.error_after_clock_out: Cannot start break after day ended

break_out.label: Break Out
break_out.error_before_clock_in: Cannot finish break before day started
break_out.error_after_clock_out: Cannot finish break after day ended

dialog.description:
A request to transfer ownership will be sent to this account.
It will be valid for 15 minutes.
Once accepted, it will automatically be shared with you.

transfer_email.subject: Invite to own timesheet "{{ name }}"
transfer_email.body:
Hi there
You have been invited to take ownership of the timesheet "{{ name }}" on timesheet.helbling.uk.

To assume ownership, follow this link: {{ link }}

Many thanks,
The timesheet team

success.title: Success! You now own this timesheet
success.description: The timesheet has been shared with the previous owner.

already_owned.title: You already own this timesheet.
already_owned.description: Log into a different account to claim ownership. The same transfer code is still valid.

dialog.title: Share
dialog.description: Share this timesheet with another account so you can access it from other devices.
dialog.confirmation: The invite has been sent. It will be valid for 15 minutes.

invite_email.subject: Invite to timesheet "{{ name }}"
invite_email.body:
Hi there
You have been invited to access the timesheet "{{ name }}" on timesheet.helbling.uk.

To accept this invite, follow this link: {{ link }}

Many thanks,
The timesheet team

share_zone.title: Share management
share_zone.owner: Not all options are available. To delete this timesheet please sign in with the owner's account or contact support.

self.disclaimer: This timesheet is not owned by you.
self.description: By completing this action you will lose access to manage this timesheet but it will still exist. You will not delete it, or any data held within it.

others.title: Revoke user access
others.description: List of accounts that are currently able to view and manage this timesheet

dialog.title: Delete all entries
dialog.description: Doing this will delete ALL recorded entries for "{{ name }}". This action cannot be undone.
dialog.guard_description: To confirm this action, please type the timesheet's name

dialog.title: Delete timesheet
dialog.description: Doing this will delete "{{ name }}" and all recorded entries.
dialog.guard_description: To confirm this action, please type the timesheet's name

change_name.title: Change your name
change_name.description: Your name is only visible to yourself and is tied to this account.

email.label: Email:
email.no_change: You cannot change your Email address.

remaining_timesheets.title: You cannot delete your account yet.
remaining_timesheets.description: To prevent accidental data loss, you must either delete or transfer ownership of your timesheets.
remaining_timesheets.list_remaining_number_other: You own {{ number }} timesheets. Here are shortcuts to the for the first 3.

dialog.label: Delete account
dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. Your account will be permanently deleted.

usp.title: Features
usp.summary:
Control your data, and access it anywhere.
This time tracking app doesn't get in your way.

self_host.title: Self-Hostable
self_host.content: Deploy on your own infrastructure. No subscriptions, ads or third parties. Your data is yours - you're in control.

shared_sheets.title: Share timesheets
shared_sheets.content: Frustrated by personal and work accounts when switching devices? Just share it with yourself and never worry about this again.

self_hosting.title: Easy self-hosting
self_hosting.subheading: Get up and running in minutes with Docker. Start the stack below, configure Pocketbase, and you're ready to go.
self_hosting.disclaimer: ⚠️ You will need to access and configure the Pocketbase backend on initial startup. See Get started for full details.

call_to_action.title: Not ready to self host?
call_to_action.subheading: Get started on our managed instance for free today. When you're ready, you can export your data and move to your own instance.
